entry.title: Special envoys fromof Armenia and Turkey meet for a second time in Vienna

media:group.media:title: Special envoys fromof Armenia and Turkey meet for a second time in Vienna
media:group.media:description:
üìçArmenian Defense Minister Suren Papikyan holds talks with Russian Defense Minister Sergey Shoygu in Moscow. üìçThe Chief of the General Staff of the Armenian Armed Forces, Artak Davtyan, has been relieved from his post. üìçThe special envoys from Armenia and Turkey have met for a second time in Vienna to continue talks on normalizing relations.

media:group.media:title: What does Russia‚Äôs invasion of Ukraine mean for Armenia?
media:group.media:description:
CivilNet host and analyst Eric Hacopian discusses the impact of Russia‚Äôs invasion of Ukraine on Armenia, as well as the impact on the global economy. He also talks about how Armenia should approach this war.
